availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, blacksmith. Ohio native. Married to Josephine Trezoni Ilifff. Father of Charles Iliff, Emma Iliff, Frank Iliff, Viola Iliff, and Oliver Iliff. Blacksmith in Cincinnati, Hamilton County, Ohio in 1850. Blacksmith in Grant County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, Cincinnati Ward 7, p. 383A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, p. 888.
